description.value: You immediately learn two of the following rituals: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Astral Projection], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Call Spirit], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Commune], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Commune], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Collective Memories], or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Binding Circle]. When you perform any ritual, you can incorporate harrow cards into the ritual to gain a +2 status bonus to all skill checks made to resolve the effects of the ritual. You can take this feat more than once; each time you do, you learn two new rituals.
